ðŸ“– Summary: InvenTree is an open-source inventory management system that provides powerful stock control and part tracking. It features a Python/Django backend with a web-based admin interface and a REST API for external integrations. A plugin system allows for custom applications and extensions, making it a versatile solution for managing inventory.
